title: Jenna Fischer
summary: Regina Marie "Jenna" Fischer[1] (born March 7, 1974)[2] is an American actress best known for her portrayal of Pam Beesly on the NBC sitcom The Office (2005â€“2013), for which she was nominated for the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Supporting Actress in a Comedy Series in 2007. She was also a producer for the show's final season.
